briefdescription.para: areaDetector driver that is a V4 neutron data client for nED.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int debug)
memberdef.name: ADnEDConfig

briefdescription.para: The following functions have C linkage, and can be called directly or from iocsh.

detaileddescription.para:
Config function for IOC shell. It instantiates an instance of the driver.
portName
The Asyn port name to use
maxBuffers
Used by asynPortDriver (set to -1 for unlimited)
maxMemory
Used by asynPortDriver (set to -1 for unlimited)
debug
This debug flag is passed to xsp3_config in the Xspress API (0 or 1)
It instantiates a PVAccess client factory for this IOC.
